text: The Intrusion of Isabel is a 1919 American silent comedy film directed by Lloyd Ingraham and starring Mary Miles Minter, J. Parks Jones, and Lucretia Harris.McCaffrey & Jacobs p. 191 ==Cast== * Mary Miles Minter as Isabel Trevor * J. Parks Jones as Bert Trevor * Lucretia Harris as Mammy Johnson * Allan Forrest as Jack Craig * Margaret Shelby as Lois Randall * George Periolat as Henry Whitney * Mary Land as Marian Whitney * Carl Stockdale as James Harris ==References== ==Bibliography== * Donald W. McCaffrey & Christopher P. Jacobs. Guide to the Silent Years of American Cinema. Greenwood Publishing, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1919 films Category:1919 comedy films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:Films directed by Lloyd Ingraham Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Intrusion of Isabel
